fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Shipping policy, competition, environment and climate change, passengers rights, liabiilty of carriers, maritime safety and security, taxation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Armateurs de France represents the French maritime transport et services companies. Our trade association : 
- represents and defends the interests of its members, 
- represents them towards the French, European and international institutions, 
- is in charge of the communication and the image of shipping, 
- is an employers association, in charge of bargaining agreements, 
- informs and advises its members.
